work.name: CivicActions
work.summary:
In my capacity as Senior Technical Product Manager at CivicActions, I've taken great joy in being part of the innovation that is transforming the digital accessibility space within the government sector. I've had the honor of leading the development of GovA11y, a novel open-source scanning tool that is drastically redefining accessibility testing for .gov and .mil domains, executing billions of tests at an unprecedented pace.

I'm also proud to have helmed the CivicGPT initiative, a project that brings the power of Artificial Intelligence to an internally searchable knowledge base. This project isn't just about enhancing organizational efficiency, it's also about ensuring stringent data security. In line with this, I've designed a self-hosted Large Language Models system that enhances trust in AI-generated content.

In my role, I've also had the chance to coordinate the development of RapidATO, an open-source solution that transforms ATO documents into more user-friendly formats. This has been pivotal in making continuous, automated-testing ATO/SSPs and security compliance not just possible, but attainable.

Furthermore, I've taken the reins of the VA.gov Platform CMS DevOps team, introducing git-ops-based Kubernetes application management and significantly reducing the backlog.

Throughout my journey, fostering a culture of collaboration and innovation has been a key focus. I'm committed to using Agile principles to spark transformative change in the digital government landscape. The future is exciting, and I look forward to continuing to contribute to these transformations.
